blank1_info = 0356474 | website = | footnotes = | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = }} Plains is a city in Sumter County, Georgia. It is the birthplace of the 39th President of the United States Jimmy Carter. He was born there in 1924. In 2020, the U.S. Census Bureau has 573 people living there. ==References== Plains
